column4: Hi folks. I have a question. Is it may imagination or is Hoary not as stable as Warty?
LOL
i loved warty. it was a rock. but yah i do have issues wit hoary. nautilus crashes for no reason sometimes. and i'm still having issues with firefox even after doing the fix for it
and naturally i have had no problems with gnome terminal LOL
what ya got for sale bz0b?
not much, just an amd 64 3200+, 1gb ram, 200gb hd, 128mb nvidia video card
i dont think that's too much
hehe
my father just sold our house for 1.5 mil, that we paid 330,000 6 years ago
i'm a noob  and have no idea what that means LOL
means that I can have root access to your computer, with access to one of your users
actually, with ssh access to any user you create on a warty box, i can crack root, no joke
you don't believe me? in a screen on the warty server i just installed, I can prove it to you
i hate to tell you this but frankly i don't care LOL
are you like that german guy that was in that thing that was going around who insisted he was going to "wipe your hard drive any second now"?
no, I am just proving the point on what you said, how warty was not as safe as hoary
i never said anythig about saftey between warty and hoary. i said stability.
ok i digressed. sorry. so is the consensus that hoary is just as stable as warty is?
in my opinion, security is part of stability
i guess i will keep my opions to my self from now on
opinions are fine.
